valid_articles.Description: ZipTie is a new tool that allows you to track your website's inclusion in Google's AI Overviews. It offers a 14-day free trial.

valid_articles.Description: Semrush has started providing data on Google AI Overviews inclusion in its sensor. The data shows that AI Overviews are currently included in only a small percentage of SERPs.

valid_articles.Title: Pew Research Center Study on Digital Decay
valid_articles.Description: A new study by Pew Research Center has found that a significant percentage of web pages from both 2013 and 2023 are no longer available. The study also found that a large percentage of news pages contain broken links.

valid_articles.Description: Microsoft faces a potential $2 billion fine from the EU due to concerns about misinformation and manipulation risks associated with Bing's AI features, such as Copilot.

valid_articles.Title: Microsoft faces multibillion-dollar fine in EU over Bing AI
valid_articles.Description: Microsoft has until May 27 to respond to a European Commission request for information regarding its Bing artificial intelligence services. Failure to comply could result in a fine of up to 1% of its annual revenue.

valid_articles.Title: Perplexity CEO Criticizes Google's AI Search

valid_articles.Title: LinkedIn's Collaborative Articles Impacted by Algorithm Changes
valid_articles.Description: LinkedIn's collaborative articles, which begin with AI-generated content and allow users to add their own contributions, experienced a significant decline in visibility after algorithm changes in the fall of 2023.

valid_articles.Description: OpenAI has dissolved its Superalignment team, which was formed in 2023 to address long-term risks associated with AI, less than a year after its announcement.
